SYSTEM_NAME: Somatic Checklist Writing System
SYSTEM_VERSION: 1.0
ENTRYPOINTS:
- /docs/ssot/
- /docs/learning/
- /dashboard/cards.json

CLUSTERS:

STRUCTURE_RULES:
- Every card includes Definitions (table), Procedure (steps), FAQ (>=3), System Claim.
- Every card declares Pass Condition; locked cards declare Unlock Rule.

MACHINE_READABLE:
- cards.json is authoritative index for all routine cards (card_id keyed).
